Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage

Both teams last played against each other in the Match 33 of the ICC Cricket World Cup, 2023 where Dilshan Madushanka scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 149 match fantasy points while Mohammed Shami topped the fantasy points leaderboard for India with 153 match fantasy points
The pitch at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo is a balanced pitch with decent assistance for both batters and bowlers on offer
Temperature will hover around 28.64 °C and humidity is expected to be around 71%
Winds at a speed of 5.53 m/s are expected. Cloud cover expected, so expect some movement to aid the pace bowlers. There is light rain expected which may affect playing conditions
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike
